column6:
The X-Men collide with some of the Brothers Grimm's most classic fairy tales! When a blind tailor awakens a beautiful red-haired princess from her eternal slumber, he thinks he's found true love at last. But a certain blade-wielding butcher named Logan may know more about the princess' past than anyone realizes.,2006,8
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:C. B. Cebulski | letterer:Dave Sharpe | penciller (cover):Bill Sienkiewicz
